word_mean: 精神病时人格整合功能的解体

sentence.Network_en: This defeat led to the disintegration of the empire.
sentence.Network_cn: 这次战败导致了帝国的瓦解.

sentence.Network_en: The incident has hastened the disintegration of the club.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一事件加速了该俱乐部的解体.

sentence.Network_en: The disintegration of the Soviet Union deprived western intelligence agencies of their main enemies.
sentence.Network_cn: 苏联解体使西方情报机构丧失了主敌。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词汇分类(1) - linglong的日志 - 网易博客 ... diffusion 漫射 disintegration 衰变，蜕变 dispersion 弥散.
-tion后缀 ... conflagration 大火(灾),突发 disintegration 瓦解 migration 移民,移植,移往,移动.
英语词汇分类(1) - linglong的日志 - 网易博客 ... diffusion 漫射 disintegration 衰变，蜕变 dispersion 弥散.
...整合在于这样的教义，即一切事件都是不可理解的、不可推理的、无意义的和纯事实的。然而，对我的思维来说，这样一种整合与完全的分解（disintegration）是一致的。由于深信这样一种观点是完全不符合事实的，因此，我必须对之进行抨击，而且，由于它到了我们这一.

list.abs: disintegration 衰变disintegration constant 衰变常数disintegrator 粉碎机
radioactive deposit 放射性沉积物radioactive disintegration 放射性衰变radioactive element 放射性元素
disintegration 分解disintegration chain 蜕变链disintegration constant 蜕变常数

entry.def: If something disintegrates, it becomes seriously weakened, and is divided or destroyed.

example.ex: During October 1918 the Austro-Hungarian Empire began to disintegrate.
example.tran: 在 1918 年 10 月间，奥匈帝国开始瓦解。

entry.def: If an object or substance disintegrates, it breaks into many small pieces or parts and is destroyed.

example.tran: 挡风玻璃在时速420英里时破碎。

means.word_mean: 3. the spontaneous disintegration of a radioactive substance along with the emission of ionizing radiation

sentences.sentence: "bomb tests resulted in the annihilation of the atoll"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 构成整体所必需的;完整的
stems_affixes.word_buile: integr完整+al……的→adj.构成整体所必需的;完整的
integrate[v.[into,with][使]成为一体,[使]结合在一起]+ion表名词→n.综合
integr完整+ity表名词→n.正直,诚实;完整,完全
dis分开+integrate成为一体→v.分裂成小片,瓦解
integr完整+ate使……→v.[into,with][使]成为一体,[使]结合在一起

sentences.en: indicators of social disintegration such as divorce, suicide and petty theft
sentences.cn: 社会解体的标志，例如离婚、自杀和小偷小摸

sentences.en: the gradual disintegration of traditional values
sentences.cn: 传统价值观念的逐渐解体

sentences.cn: 这次战败道致了帝国的瓦解。
